info.+content: La combattente che veste alla marinaretta Sailor Moon
美少女戦士セーラームーン

Usagi Tsukino is a normal girl until she meets up with Luna, a talking cat, who tells her that she is Sailor Moon. As Sailor Moon, Usagi must fight evils and enforce justice, in the name of the Moon and the mysterious Moon Princess. She meets other people destined to be senshi, and together, they fight the forces of evil.
Sailormoon Channel - 美少女戦士セーラームーン公式ホームページ
